title: FPS Lag after Patch 5.3
body: Hi remember me? no? well i wrote a thread regarding lag after 5.1  but after patch 5.2 everything was fine could run the game at high at 60 FPS but after 5.3 im getting shaky FPS from 60 to 40 and this even happens when i drop all my settings to low pleas help me :(.

replies.body: Yeah me too, game drops sub 15fps and is never stable throughout the whole game since the new patch. Running GTX765 8GB RAM, please fix this, the game is nearly unplayable

when i type in google patch 5.3 fps low i found so many posts like this!
RIOT broke something and i dont see that they are doing something to fix it! 
how many time i need to wait? next patch? gj riot
At least your not getting 15 FPS in fights ;(
I looked over the patch notes and i didn't see any changes to texture of the map maybe im lazy or blind

I was getting about ~400, ~300 in team fights, now it's ~140 in team fights :'(

Btw I'm using the gtx 980 from MSI and the i7-4790k
same problem here the last patch i was playing on medium quality with 100fps and now, on this patch i have 30fps and 5 fps on team fights
Hope they try to fix it  ;( {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
My game has also been doing this ever since the 5.3 patch. Before that it was perfectly fine but now it is just %%%%ting on me in team fights and i can't even go online now because of it.
ya i used to get between 80-100 now i'm like 30-50 and during fights i drop between 5--15. alrdy lost rankeds for this. cmon rito
me too, riot needs to fix I can't play with 15 fps team fights

I'm getting this too, lol, and I can run most modern games on high quality on this machine.

Rito pls.
